statements: DELETE FROM events WHERE event_name = 'Birthday Party'
DELETE FROM events WHERE event_id = 1 AND event_date = '2022-12-25';
DELETE FROM events WHERE event_name LIKE 'Birthday%' AND event_date >= '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM events WHERE event_location = 'New York' AND event_time < '18:00:00';
DELETE FROM attendees WHERE attendee_id = 'b18b119d-abc0-4d9b-b645-8721000a721c' AND JSON_CONTAINS(events_attending, '3f4fa889-5c3b-4a86-a648-5115db7707bd');
DELETE FROM event_attendees WHERE event_id = 1 AND attendee_id = 1;
DELETE FROM event_attendees WHERE event_id = 1234 AND attendee_id = 5678;
DELETE FROM attendees WHERE attendee_id IN (SELECT attendee_id FROM event_attendees WHERE event_id = 1234);
DELETE FROM events WHERE event_id NOT IN (SELECT event_id FROM event_attendees);
DELETE FROM attendees WHERE attending_event_id IN (SELECT event_id FROM events WHERE event_date < '2023-01-01');
DELETE FROM event_sessions WHERE event_id IN (SELECT event_id FROM events WHERE event_time < '14:00:00');
